description: Numbers n such that 41^n - 40^n is prime.
comments: Terms greater than 1000 are often only strong pseudoprimes.a(12) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Jul 31 2012
author: _Mike Oakes_, May 18 2001, May 19 2001
extensions: a(8)-a(11) (Computed by Adam Marciniec) from _Robert Price_, Jul 31 2012
